extension.author: jbostoen
extension.label: Class: User Request (ITIL) - Several tweaks
extension.description: Adds 'in person' and 'monitoring' option as 'origin'; prevents title/caller_id from becoming read-only; changes default impact to 'Person'; makes 'Public Log' only visible after assigning a ticket; makes solution and solution code invisible and not mandatory; always lookup related Change, Incident, Problem; show phone number of caller
